relation: This does not apply as I am living at home.
These classes are not easy. However, I think they will prepare you for teaching.

If you are going to take your classes online, please explore every aspect of the website for every class. It is very easy to miss something. If you are planning on student teaching with National, make sure that you have an advisor who is on top of things. Mine was fired, and I missed some meeting dates, so now I am a semester behind, which is why I am applying for this scholarship. I will need the money to work on my masters degree in history while I am waiting to student teach.

National's online classes are preparing me for teaching. It requires working in classrooms in addition to school work online. When I complete the course work I feel that I will be well prepared to teach my subject area.
pageTitle: National University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {70653=I will start Nursing school in October, and so far I love the school. Teachers are very helpful and the staff is too. The Nursing program has a very good reputation too., 201439=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}
textBeforeTable: 07/25/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 56 Kelsey from Fair Oaks, CA Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Categories Comments What to do for fun national university is located in san diego county. there is the zoo, museums, theaters and beaches all within an hours driving distance to the campus. Food and Dining i don't know what national university's amenities are in this regard. Dorm Life i live off campus and am not aware if national university offers a dorm. Academic Rigor i've found the classes to not be nearly as difficult as i had thought they would be. the amount of resources supplied online and through the textbooks are surprisingly comprehensive and informative, i haven't had any problem keeping up with the subjects. Tips for prospective students i found a great beginning to my education at national university with my admissions counselor. he was able to refer me to my financial counselor and plan my academic schedule completely. In three sentences national university has a comprehensive administration set up that makes registration and educational planning easier than i've seen at any other institution. i was able to become enrolled and begin my education path easily after a 10
